DOC.brief_summary: This study design collect post market data use VEST , particularly saphenous vein graft right territory heart .
DOC.brief_title: CD0104 VEST II Post Marketing Surveillance Study
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective test early-mid term patency rate VEST support Right Coronary Artery ( RCA ) bypass graft . The research participant undergo CABG preparation CABG procedure routinely standard care . During procedure VEST implant vein graft Right Coronary Artery accord IFU . Perioperative care accord standard care . Upon discharge patient prescribe statin aspirin 6 month . Patient attend routine clinic visit 4-6 week post operatively . The last study visit occur 3-6 month post operatively . Patients undergo noninvasive coronary CT angiography .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient schedule onpump CABG clinical ground 2 . At least one vein graft bypass indicate right coronary artery LIMA indicate LAD clinical ground 3 . Appropriately size accessible target coronary artery , minimum diameter 1.5 mm adequate vascular bed , assess preoperative cardiac angiography . 1 . Concomitant nonCABG cardiac procedure 2 . Prior cardiac surgery 3 . Emergency CABG surgery ( cardiogenic shock , inotropic pressure support , IABP ) 4 . Contraindication onpump CABG cardioplegic arrest ( e.g . severely calcified aorta ) 5 . Calcification intend anastomotic site , assess upon open chest VEST implantation . 6 . Prior debilitate stroke less 1 year surgery 7 . Severe renal dysfunction ( Cr > 2.0 mg/dL ) 8 . Concomitant lifethreatening disease likely limit life expectancy le 2 year .
